p: The fresh aerial parts were cut into small pieces and subjected to hydrodistillation for 3 h using a Clevenger apparatus. Hydrodistillation was performed 11 times until a sufficient amount was collected. The obtained essential oil was dried using anhydrous sodium sulfate and stored in a tightly closed container at 4 Â°C until further use [ 26]. The calculated essential oil yield was expressed in percentage (% v/ w), based on the weight of the fresh plant material.
